body:
Welcome to the fifth edition of the newly relaunched staff spotlight. Today, we're taking a look at {tag=fbd4b4d461864581b408666bb8a12df4}, and getting to know her a bit better.

Introduce yourself (4 or more sentences)

Hey my name is Paige, but I am mostly known as Ashley. I am currently 17 years old, and really enjoy watching and analyzing films. I also have played soccer since I was 4 and plan to continue playing. My dream job is to teach a film class at a university. I’ve been playing on Avicus for almost 4 years now, and my favorite gamemode is Walls.

What are your hobbies?

My hobbies include playing soccer, games, and watching films.

​What are you most excited/obsessed over at the moment?

I’m completely obsessed with the Wonder Woman film at the moment. I’ve seen it 4 times in theaters, and I think they did a great job with it.

What interests you the most in life?

 I have a huge interest in film and soccer, but also traveling around the world to visit new and different places seems cool.

What music/art/media do you like?

I like any type of music as long as it is not country. I enjoy using snapchat and instagram for social media.

​Where are you from?

I’m from California.

What’s your favourite thing about moderating?

My favorite aspect of moderating would be helping out the community whenever I get the chance.

What’s your most memorable experience as a moderator?

I have not had too many memorable experiences since I have not been moderator for very long, but meeting new people and making new friends within and outside the staff team is pretty awesome. :]
